SELECT ID as id, NAME as name, CREATED_AT as created_at, UPDATED_AT as updated_at FROM BOT_CATEGORIES WHERE (ID = #{name} OR NAME = #{name})
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO BOT_CATEGORIES d USING ( SELECT #{id} AS ID, #{name} AS NAME, #{created_at} AS CREATED_AT, #{updated_at} AS UPDATED_AT FROM DUAL ) s ON (s.NAME = d.NAME ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ID, NAME, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( s.ID, s.NAME, s.CREATED_AT, s.UPDATED_AT ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET UPDATED_AT = s.UPDATED_AT
